trans-unit.source: Represents a trigger that applies property values or performs actions when a set of conditions are satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 속성 값을 적용 하거나 조건 집합을 충족 하는 경우 작업을 수행 하는 트리거를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: MultiTrigger enables you to set property values or start actions based on a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Condition>s.
trans-unit.target: MultiTrigger 속성 값을 설정 하거나 <xref:System.Windows.Condition>s</xref:System.Windows.Condition> 의 컬렉션에 기반 하는 작업을 시작할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A condition is met when the value of the property (specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Property%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Condition> class) of the element matches the specified <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 조건이 충족 되는 경우 속성의 값 (지정 된는 <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Property%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Condition>클래스) 요소에 지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A> 일치</xref:System.Windows.Condition> </xref:System.Windows.Condition.Property%2A>

trans-unit.source: The comparison is a reference equality check.
trans-unit.target: 비교 참조 일치 검사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can then use setters or the <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.EnterActions%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.ExitActions%2A> properties to apply changes or start actions when all of the conditions are met.
trans-unit.target: Setter 또는는 <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.EnterActions%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.ExitActions%2A>속성 변경 내용을 적용 하거나 조건이 모두 충족 될 때 작업을 시작할을</xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.ExitActions%2A> </xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.EnterActions%2A> 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger.Setters%2A> property of a MultiTrigger object can only consist of <xref:System.Windows.Setter> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger.Setters%2A>MultiTrigger 개체의 속성 수만 구성 <xref:System.Windows.Setter>개체.</xref:System.Windows.Setter> </xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger.Setters%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Setter> child to a MultiTrigger object implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection> for the MultiTrigger object.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref:System.Windows.Setter>MultiTrigger 개체에 자식이 암시적으로 추가 된 <xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection>MultiTrigger 개체에 대 한.</xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Setter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects are not supported; only <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> supports <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>개체가 지원 되지 않습니다. 만 <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=fullName>지원 <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>개체.</xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> </xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.MultiTrigger"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.MultiTrigger"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Changes to property values are applied when all of the conditions in the collection are met.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 조건을 모두 충족 되 면 속성 값의 변경 내용이 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *ZeroOrMoreConditions* Zero or more objects.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 속성 요소 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *ZeroOrMoreConditions*&0; 개 이상의 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger> enables you to set property values or start actions based on a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Condition> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>속성 값을 설정 하거나의 컬렉션에 기반 하는 작업을 시작할 수 있도록 <xref:System.Windows.Condition>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Condition></xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>

trans-unit.source: A condition is met when the value of the property (specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Property%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Condition> class) of the element matches the specified <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 조건이 충족 되는 경우 속성의 값 (지정 된는 <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Property%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Condition>클래스) 요소에 지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A> 일치</xref:System.Windows.Condition> </xref:System.Windows.Condition.Property%2A>

trans-unit.source: The comparison that is performed is a reference equality check.
trans-unit.target: 수행 되는 비교는 참조 일치 검사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger> applies the associated setters or actions when all of the conditions are true (binary and operation).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>관련된 setter 또는 작업 조건을 모두 만족 하는 경우에 적용 됩니다 (바이너리 및 작업).</xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Note that for <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>s, each condition in the collection must set both the <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Property%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 위해 <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>s, 컬렉션에 있는 각 조건 모두 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Property%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Condition.Property%2A> </xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Condition> page for more information.
trans-unit.target: 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Condition>자세한 내용을 보려면 페이지.</xref:System.Windows.Condition>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 빈 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref> objects, which describe the property values to apply when all of the conditions of the <xref href="System.Windows.MultiTrigger"></xref> are met.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"> </xref> 될 때 적용할 속성 값을 설명 하는 개체의 조건을 모두는 <xref href="System.Windows.MultiTrigger"> </xref> 충족 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *ZeroOrMoreSetters* Zero or more objects.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 속성 요소 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *ZeroOrMoreSetters*&0; 개 이상의 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects are not supported.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>개체는 지원 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger> enables you to start actions or set property values using <xref:System.Windows.Setter> objects when a set of conditions have been met.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>작업을 시작 하거나 <xref:System.Windows.Setter>충족 된 경우 조건 집합이 개체를</xref:System.Windows.Setter> 사용 하 여 속성 값을 설정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>

trans-unit.source: If there are two <xref:System.Windows.Setter> objects in the same or different setter collections setting the same property, the Setter that is declared last is used.
trans-unit.target: 두 개 있는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Setter>동일한 속성을 마지막으로 선언 된 Setter 설정 같거나 다른 setter 컬렉션의 개체 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Setter>

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Setter> child to a <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger> object implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger> object.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref:System.Windows.Setter>에 자식은 <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>개체가 암시적으로 추가 된 <xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection>에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>개체.</xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger> </xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection> </xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger> </xref:System.Windows.Setter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects are not supported; only <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> supports <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>개체가 지원 되지 않습니다. 만 <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=fullName>지원 <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>개체.</xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> </xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 null입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 자식 개체를 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>인터페이스.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> </xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 자식 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 개체에 있는 노드의 텍스트 콘텐츠를 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>인터페이스.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> </xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 개체에 추가할 텍스트입니다.
